part.content: CHAPTER I : PRELIMINARY. Sec. 1 - 2.
CHAPTER II : INVENTIONS NOT PATENTABLE. Sec. 3 - 5.
CHAPTER III : APPLICATIONS FOR PATENTS. Sec. 6 - 11.
CHAPTER IV : EXAMINATION OF APPLICATIONS. Sec. 11A - 24.
CHAPTER IVA : EXCLUSIVE MARKETING RIGHTS. Sec. 24A - 24F. (Repealed).
CHAPTER V : OPPOSITION TO GRANT OF PATENT. Sec. 25 - 28.
CHAPTER VI : ANTICIPATION. Sec. 29 - 34.
CHAPTER VII : PROVISIONS FOR SECRECY OF CERTAIN INVENTIONS. Sec. 35 - 42.
CHAPTER VIII : GRANT AND SEALING OF PATENTS AND RIGHTS CONFERRED THEREBY. Sec. 43 - 53.
CHAPTER IX : PATENTS OF ADDITION. Sec. 54 - 56.
CHAPTER X : AMENDMENT OF APPLICATIONS AND SPECIFICATIONS. Sec. 57 - 59.
CHAPTER XI : RESTORATION OF LAPSED PATENTS. Sec. 60 - 62.
CHAPTER XII : SURRENDER AND REVOCATION OF PATENTS. Sec. 63 - 66.
CHAPTER XIII : REGISTER OF PATENTS. Sec. 67 - 72.
CHAPTER XIV : PATENT OFFICE AND ITS ESTABLISHMENT. Sec. 73 - 76.
CHAPTER XV : POWERS OF CONTROLLER GENERALLY. Sec. 77 - 81.
CHAPTER XVI : WORKING OF PATENTS, COMPULSORY LICENCES, LICENCES OF RIGHT AND REVOCATION. Sec. 82 - 98.
CHAPTER XVII : USE OF INVENTIONS FOR PURPOSES OF GOVERNMENT AND ACQUISITION OF INVENTIONS BY CENTRAL GOVERNMENT. Sec. 99 - 103.
CHAPTER XVIII : SUITS CONCERNING INFRINGEMENT OF PATENTS. Sec. 104 - 115.
CHAPTER XIX : APPEALS TO THE APPELLATE BOARD. Sec. 116 - 117H.
CHAPTER XX : PENALTIES. Sec. 118 - 124.
CHAPTER XXI : PATENT AGENTS. Sec. 125 - 132.
CHAPTER XXII : INTERNATIONAL ARRANGEMENTS. Sec. 133 - 139.
CHAPTER XXIII : MISCELLANEOUS. Sec. 140 - 163.
